question: Most of the time, I am willing to disclose appropriate personal feelings to help build trust
I make it a point to ask for help and encourage others' involvement
I make it a point to let others know I "hear" and understand how they feel before moving on in a discussion
I am comfortable letting others maintain control over tasks when the going get tough or the stakes go up
I am comfortable disclosing what I know about a situation or business rationale, as appropriate
I make it a point to maintain and enhance others' self-esteem
I think I do a good job of creating an environment in which others feel comfortable expressing their feelings, good or bad
I am comfortable being open with my coworkers and sharing my thoughts on important issues
I take opportunities to let others know the value they bring to the organization/team
I make sure I get input from team or group members before making a decision
I am comfortable showing others how to approach a task and then letting them do it on their own
I make it a point to express confidence in others' abilities
I am comfortable incorporating others' suggestions as part of a plan instead of doing it all myself
I provide others with support without removing their responsibility for action
I am good at helping others overcome barriers and identify the resources they need
I make it a point to explain the benefits of a newly delegated responsibility or task
I am comfortable asking for other people's ideas, opinions, or solutions
I am inclined to confirm how others are feeling by verbally summarizing the emotions and information they express
I usually make it a point to let people know that their accomplishments or ideas and suggestions are appreciated
I am comfortable supporting associates' ideas even if they aren't how I would approach situations or problems
I am good at developing an accurate understanding other others' feelings
I am good at complementing others when they do something well
I am good at listening to others and responding with empathy
I work with others to set up tracking procedures for monitoring the success or achievement of a project
I am good at letting others know of any issues or concerns I have regarding a situation or issue
